title: Jesus Heals and Forgives
summary: In Mark 2, Jesus heals a paralyzed man after forgiving his sins, revealing His authority to forgive. He calls Levi, a tax collector, to follow Him and eats with sinners, challenging religious expectations. Jesus also explains why His disciples do not fast and teaches about the Sabbath, emphasizing mercy over ritual.

faq.question: What is a key message in Mark 2?
faq.answer: It emphasizes the servant nature of Jesus and the power of faith in action.

faq.question: What does Mark 2 reveal about Jesus?
faq.answer: It shows His authority, compassion, and call to follow Him wholeheartedly.
